# abbreviation

**Instance Property**

A localized short abbreviation of the wind compass direction.

## Declaration

```swift
var abbreviation: String { get }
```

## Describing the compass direction

- **accessibilityDescription**: A localized accessibility description describing the compass direction.
- **description**: A localized string describing the compass direction.
